con:call.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ns="http://www.alfresco.org/ws/service/repository/1.0" xmlns:ns1="http://www.alfresco.org/ws/cml/1.0" xmlns:ns2="http://www.alfresco.org/ws/model/content/1.0"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd"> <wsu:Timestamp wsu:Id="Timestamp-14" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsu:Created>2009-12-10T12:42:00+00:00</wsu:Created> <wsu:Expires>2009-12-10T23:00:00+00:00</wsu:Expires> </wsu:Timestamp> <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-666" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:Username>admin</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">TICKET_73738f517e458c2af3f582db7728b9d26704fcb3</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header>
<soapenv:Body> <update> <statements> <!-- create es una (de 12) operación CML, permite crear el nodo no su contenido --> <!-- para crear contenido se debe hacer con otra operacion CML llamada writeContent --> <!-- también es posible crear contenido con el request de ContentService_write --> <create> <ns1:id>1</ns1:id> <parent> <store> <scheme>workspace</scheme> <address>SpacesStore</address> </store> <path>/app:company_home/app:guest_home</path> <associationType>{http://www.alfresco.org/model/content/1.0}contains</associationType> <childName>{http://www.alfresco.org/model/content/1.0}pruebaB.txt</childName> </parent> <type>{http://www.alfresco.org/model/content/1.0}content</type> <property> <name>{http://www.alfresco.org/model/content/1.0}name</name> <isMultiValue>false</isMultiValue> <value>pruebaB.txt</value> </property> <property> <name>{http://www.alfresco.org/model/content/1.0}description</name> <isMultiValue>false</isMultiValue> <value>Descripcion de prueba</value> </property> </create>
<!-- Otras operaciones CML disponibles -->
<!--Zero or more repetitions: removeAspect -->
<!--Zero or more repetitions: update-->
<!--Zero or more repetitions: writeContent-->
<!--Zero or more repetitions: delete-->
<!--Zero or more repetitions: move-->
<!--Zero or more repetitions: copy-->
<!--Zero or more repetitions: addChild-->
<!--Zero or more repetitions: removeChild-->
<!--Zero or more repetitions: createAssociation-->
<!--Zero or more repetitions: removeAssociation-->
</statements> </update> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ns="http://www.alfresco.org/ws/service/authoring/1.0" xmlns:ns1="http://www.alfresco.org/ws/model/content/1.0">

<soapenv:Body> <!-- Sólo funciona para asset alojado dentro de un proyecto de Alfresco WCM --> <!-- Para crear un proyecto WCM (Site) es necesario usar Alfresco Share --> <!-- Una vez creado el proyecto, desde Alfresco ECM crear el contenido --> <!-- El contenido creado se alojará en: /app:company_home/st:sites/cm:testsite1/cm:documentLibrary --> <ns:revertVersion>

<ns:versionLabel>1.0</ns:versionLabel> </ns:revertVersion> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: write
con:request.con:description: TestStep que permite escribrir contenido sobre un nodo.
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd"> <wsu:Timestamp wsu:Id="Timestamp-6251267" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsu:Created>2011-11-24T12:08:45+00:00</wsu:Created> <wsu:Expires>2011-11-24T23:00:00+00:00</wsu:Expires> </wsu:Timestamp> <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-22700073" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:Username>ticket</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">TICKET_36312493f13e0c67cc2269c42ff4ffca6f52d4e2</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body>
<!-- write nos permite escribir contenido a un nodo determinado por su UUID y name --> <write> <node> <store> <scheme>workspace</scheme> <address>SpacesStore</address> </store> <uuid>78b4225a-ded4-43a3-afd2-c5b0bba17db6</uuid> <path/> </node> <property>{http://www.alfresco.org/model/content/1.0}content</property> <content>CkVzdGUgZmljaGVybyAocHJ1ZWJhMDEudHh0KSBmdWUgY3JlYWRvIGRlc2RlIGxvcyBXUyBkZSBBbGZyZXNjbyAoY29udGVudC1zZXJ2aWNlLndzZGwpCg==</content> <format> <mimetype>text/plain</mimetype> <encoding>UTF-8</encoding> </format> </write> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:testStep.name: PropertyTransfer 3
con:testStep.con:description: Mecanismo que permite transferir los valores de las Propiedades entre el TestStep anterior y posterior adyacentes a el.

con:request.name: read
con:request.con:description: TestStep que permite leer el contenido y las propiedades de un nodo.
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ns="http://www.alfresco.org/ws/service/content/1.0" xmlns:ns1="http://www.alfresco.org/ws/model/content/1.0"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd"> <wsu:Timestamp wsu:Id="Timestamp-14" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsu:Created>2011-11-24T12:08:45+00:00</wsu:Created> <wsu:Expires>2011-11-24T23:00:00+00:00</wsu:Expires> </wsu:Timestamp> <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-666" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:Username>admin</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">TICKET_36312493f13e0c67cc2269c42ff4ffca6f52d4e2</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body>
<!-- Read permite leer el contenido o una propiedad de un nodo --> <ns:read> <ns:items> <ns1:nodes> <store> <scheme>workspace</scheme> <address>SpacesStore</address> </store> <uuid/> <path>/app:company_home/app:guest_home/cm:test-1322136525517.txt</path> </ns1:nodes> </ns:items> <ns:property>{http://www.alfresco.org/model/content/1.0}content</ns:property> </ns:read>
</soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:testStep.name: PropertyTransfer 4

con:request.name: transform
con:request.con:description: TestStep que tranforma el contenido de un nodo.
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ns="http://www.alfresco.org/ws/service/content/1.0" xmlns:ns1="http://www.alfresco.org/ws/model/content/1.0"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd"> <wsu:Timestamp wsu:Id="Timestamp-14" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsu:Created>2011-11-24T12:08:45+00:00</wsu:Created> <wsu:Expires>2011-11-24T23:00:00+00:00</wsu:Expires> </wsu:Timestamp> <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-666" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:Username>admin</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">TICKET_36312493f13e0c67cc2269c42ff4ffca6f52d4e2</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body>
<!-- Transforma permite convertir de formato el contenido o una propiedad de un nodo --> <ns:transform> <ns:source> <store> <scheme>workspace</scheme> <address>SpacesStore</address> </store> <uuid/> <path>/app:company_home/app:guest_home/cm:test-1322136525517.txt</path> </ns:source> <ns:property>{http://www.alfresco.org/model/content/1.0}content</ns:property> <ns:destinationReference> <store> <scheme>workspace</scheme> <address>SpacesStore</address> </store> <uuid/> <path>/app:company_home/app:guest_home/cm:test-1322136525517.txt</path> </ns:destinationReference> <ns:destinationProperty>{http://www.alfresco.org/model/content/1.0}content</ns:destinationProperty> <ns:destinationFormat> <ns1:mimetype>application/pdf</ns1:mimetype> <ns1:encoding>UTF-8</ns1:encoding> </ns:destinationFormat> </ns:transform>
</soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: clear
con:request.con:description: TestStep que permite borrar el contenido de un nodo.
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ns="http://www.alfresco.org/ws/service/content/1.0" xmlns:ns1="http://www.alfresco.org/ws/model/content/1.0"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd"> <wsu:Timestamp wsu:Id="Timestamp-14" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsu:Created>2011-11-24T12:08:45+00:00</wsu:Created> <wsu:Expires>2011-11-24T23:00:00+00:00</wsu:Expires> </wsu:Timestamp> <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-666" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:Username>admin</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">TICKET_36312493f13e0c67cc2269c42ff4ffca6f52d4e2</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body>
<!-- Clear borra el contenido o una propiedad de un nodo --> <!-- En este caso hago clean de la prop. description --> <ns:clear> <ns:items> <ns1:nodes> <store> <scheme>workspace</scheme> <address>SpacesStore</address> </store> <uuid/> <path>/app:company_home/app:guest_home/cm:test-1322136525517.txt</path> </ns1:nodes> </ns:items> <ns:property>{http://www.alfresco.org/model/content/1.0}content</ns:property> </ns:clear>
</soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
